backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user registration, login, session creation, and profile initialization using access control and in‑memory maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old session format to new structures and initializing empty credential and token maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend components covering app structure, auth flows, navigation, settings, and UI elements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining light and dark mode CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling auth state, profile setup flow, and rendering the responsive application shell.
frontend/src/auth/authMessages.ts: Central list of user-facing authentication and session-related message constants.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication provider managing login, registration, session restore, validation, and connection error handling.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Provides utilities to save, load, validate, and clear auth session data in localStorage with timestamp normalization.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Re-exports the AuthProvider context hook for accessing auth state.
Renders a centered auth page layout with logo, title, optional description, and children content.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Displays a channel category with drag‑and‑drop reordering, admin checks, and a dialog for creating channels.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Dialog for adding a new category to a server with validation, backend guard, and mutation handling.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels with type selection, validation, and mutation state handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message composer allowing users to type and send messages with backend checks and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected channel, auto-scrolls, and includes a composer and basic channel header controls.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a chat message with avatar, author name, timestamp, and content, using profile data and navigation handlers.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Displays a searchable list of community servers and allows joining them.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Shows a server preview card with name, description, member count, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the DM home view or friends view, with an empty-state message for no DMs.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Displays a friend's avatar, name, status, and action buttons for messaging, calling, or managing.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabs for managing friends, pending requests, and adding new friends.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Layouts the desktop UI with server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses and renders the main view based on navigation state, including chat, DM, discovery, or settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout with slide-out sheets for servers, channels, and members, plus main content and settings access.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop shells based on screen width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Lists server members with profile info and lets users select a member for viewing details.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Renders the server channel sidebar with category display, expansion, drag‑and‑drop reordering, and category creation. Syncs ordering with backend and handles server selection states.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Provides a mobile top navigation bar with buttons to open server, channel, member lists, and user settings. Shows the current server or view title.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Displays a vertical server list with ordering, home navigation, and a button to create servers. Handles server selection and backend action restrictions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new users to set a display name and saves the profile via backend mutation. Shows loading state during submission.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog for assigning or removing roles from a user, with loading prevention per‑role and scrollable role list. Uses backend mutations to update role membership.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Shows a full user profile overlay with avatar, banner, roles, and admin tools like role assignment. Loads profile, username, roles, and server context data.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name and description fields, backend validation, and disabled state handling. Submits server creation and resets state on close.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Displays a server icon image or a fallback with the server's initial if no icon is provided.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating text or voice channels, handling form input, category selection, and mutation requests.
Dialog allowing users to move a channel to another category, offering category selection and move confirmation.
Panel for selecting a server member and managing their assigned roles, including viewing and editing role assignments.
Displays the server's audit log with event formatting, sorting, and error/loading states.
Manages channel ordering and creation within categories, including admin-only move actions and ordering persistence.
Displays and edits basic server settings like description, images, and community mode, saving changes via API.
Lets admins pick a server member, view their roles, and open a dialog to manage role assignments.
Allows creating new server roles and viewing existing ones, with a panel for assigning roles to members.
Provides the layout and navigation for server settings pages, switching views based on the selected section.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Lets users change theme and text scale through radio buttons and a slider.
Fetches and updates user profile fields and username, with forms for editing account details.
Provides the layout and navigation for user settings pages, including profile, appearance, and logout.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Shows connection status to the backend with loading, error instructions, and retry handling.
Displays a static stage channel layout with mock speakers and audience avatars and a button to raise a hand.
Handles voice channel connection logic, participant display, and mute/deafen state using backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Determines whether backend actions should be disabled based on backend connection state.
Tracks backend connection readiness using a safe actor and a lightweight health check, providing retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity-loading logic via React context and DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Returns a boolean indicating whether the viewport width is below a given breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Handles logout by clearing auth state and flushing all React Query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many typed backend queries and mutations for profiles, usernames, servers, channels, messages, and voice presence with friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes a backend actor with identity support, error handling, and retry logic including optional admin-token initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines theme CSS variables for dark and light modes plus basic global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements sign‑in and sign‑up UI with validation, form handling, and error display using the auth hook.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides a React context managing app navigation state, selected server/channel, and settings visibility.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Manages notification override settings in localStorage and exposes helpers for mute checks.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Implements a settings context storing theme, accent, text scale, notifications, and keybinds with persistence.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces for servers, channels, members, messages, roles, and audit logs.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Functions to apply and build custom ordering for categories and channels based on persisted server ordering data.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Utilities to hide a DOM element by XPath with optional MutationObserver-based continuous removal.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Provides helpers to sanitize hex color strings, detect lightness, and choose contrast text colors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and retrieving or clearing them.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it doesn't resolve within the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, issues, and feature requests for implementing authentication flows.
